documents.document: proud of yourself, Oadby and Wigston?
there's always someone has to ruin it, and this time it was Thanet
Medway, Stockton-on-Tees, Basildon... where to begin?
really glad you could make it, Stratford-on-Avon 🚽
Repent at leisure, Derbyshire Dales, repent at leisure.
you were a big help, North Tyneside 👏 👏 👏
I'm not angry with you, East Lindsey... I'm just disappointed
oh Oadby and Wigston, we used to be so close
really glad you could make it, Rossendale /s
You just sit there, Portsmouth, and think about what you've done.
I trusted you, Northumberland, and this is how you repay me?
have fun explaining this to your grandchildren, Cheshire East
don't expect a Christmas card, Rochdale
thanks for your contribution, South Staffordshire 💩
Anything else you'd like to share, Kirklees?
pat on the back, Reigate and Banstead 👏
you were a big help, Welwyn Hatfield 😕
there's always someone has to ruin it, and this time it was King's Lynn and West Norfolk
this is on you, Epping Forest
maybe it was funny at the time, Basildon
Spare me your excuses, East Northamptonshire.
I expected better from you, North West Leicestershire
I'm not angry with you, Thanet... I'm just disappointed
well fucking done, Reigate and Banstead 👏 👏 👏
we should do this more often, Scarborough 👏 👏 👏
we should do this more often, Bedford
Take care of yourself, Chichester. I guess that's what you're best at.
Strangford, Huntingdonshire, West Devon... where to begin?
You just sit there, Derbyshire Dales, and think about what you've done.
Harborough? Nope, doesn't ring a bell
maybe it was funny at the time, Amber Valley
a big hand for Merthyr Tydfil 💩
I trusted you, Powys, and this is how you repay me?
I'm not angry with you, Barrow-in-Furness... I'm just disappointed
I'm not angry with you, Castle Point... I'm just disappointed
Preston? Nope, doesn't ring a bell
I trusted you, Rossendale, and this is how you repay me?
I'm not angry with you, South Bucks... I'm just disappointed
I'm not angry with you, Newport... I'm just disappointed
I'm not angry with you, Dover... I'm just disappointed
really glad you could make it, North East Derbyshire </sarcasm >
it's been fun, Nottingham, but I think we're done here
You're dead to me, Rhondda Cynon Taf.
okay, great talking to you Braintree 🚽
I expected better from you, Chesterfield
okay, great talking to you Gateshead #NoReally
